weekly_top_story.headline: Trump Unveils Interest in Acquiring Greenland, Sparking Global Debate on Sovereignty and Strategy
weekly_top_story.summary: US President Trump has reignited calls to purchase Greenland, highlighting its strategic military value amid Arctic tensions, prompting strong pushback from Denmark and Greenland leaders on sovereignty.

stories.headline: Trump Hikes Tariffs On South Korean Goods To 25%
stories.summary: US President Trump imposed 25% tariffs on South Korean imports, escalating trade tensions and potentially disrupting global supply chains in electronics and autos.

stories.headline: Severe Winter Storm Hits United States, Leaves Over One Million Without Power
stories.summary: A massive winter storm battered multiple US states, causing widespread power outages for over a million people and thousands of flight cancellations, straining infrastructure amid extreme weather.

stories.headline: Israel Recovers Remains of Last Hostage in Gaza as Ceasefire Enters Tricky New Phase
stories.summary: Israel retrieved the remains of the final hostage from Gaza, marking a milestone in the ceasefire but raising concerns over its fragile stability and ongoing regional tensions.
